Package com.elmenus.task.drones.controller

Class DroneController

java.lang.Object
com.elmenus.task.drones.controller.DroneController
@Validated @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/drones") public class DroneController extends Object
Controller class for managing drone-related operations.

      Parameters:
      e - The exception to be handled.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with an error message and HTTP status.

      Parameters:
      droneDTO - The DTO representing the drone to be registered.
      Returns:

    • loadDroneWithMedications

      @PostMapping("/{serialNumber}/load") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DroneDTO> loadDroneWithMedications(@PathVariable String serialNumber, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Set<MedicationDTO> medications)
      Endpoint for loading a drone with medications.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone.
      medications - Set of MedicationDTO representing medications to be loaded.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the loaded drone DTO and HTTP status.

    • changeDroneState

      @PostMapping("/{serialNumber}/change-state/{newState}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DroneDTO> changeDroneState(@PathVariable String serialNumber, @PathVariable DroneState newState)
      Endpoint for changing the state of a drone.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone.
      newState - The new state to set for the drone.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the changed drone DTO and HTTP status.
